materials.name: Instructor Information
materials.description: Instructor: Jonathan Johannsen. Email: jjohannsen1@mtsac.edu. Office Location: 61-1612. Office Phone: (909) 274-4669. Preferred contact method is Canvas Inbox.

materials.name: Office Hours
materials.description: Monday and Wednesday from 12:15 – 1:45pm, and Tuesday and Thursday from 8:40 – 9:10am in office 61-1612. No appointment needed.

materials.name: Course Schedule
materials.description: Class meets Tuesday & Thursday. Lecture: 1:30 – 2:55pm. Lab: 3:05 – 3:55pm. There is a 10-minute break between lecture and lab.

materials.name: Textbook and Required Software
materials.description: Textbook: Assembly Language for x86 Processors Eighth Edition by Kip Irvine, ISBN 9780136681649. Software: Access to a Windows computer with Microsoft Visual Studio 2022 community edition installed.

materials.name: Prerequisites
materials.description: Prerequisite: CSCI 110. Advisory: CSCI 140 or CSCI 145.

materials.name: Grading Policy
materials.description: Lab Exercises: 5%, Participation: 5%, Quizzes: 5%, Homework and Projects: 15%, Exam #1: 20%, Exam #2: 20%, Final: 30%.
